alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:04PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 804 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Pueblo Depot, or 20 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
